def_cn: 随便对待;不很认真地考虑
def_en: If you toy with an idea, you consider it casually without making any decisions about it.

def_cn: (尤指心不在焉地)玩弄，摆弄
def_en: If you toy with an object, you keep moving it around with your fingers, especially while you are thinking about something else.

def_cn: 拨弄(食物);漫不经心地小口啜(饮料)
def_en: If you toy with food or drink, you do not eat or drink it with any enthusiasm, but only take a bite or a little drink from time to time.
